title: Brazil to harvest its third-largest coffee crop this year
description:
Better climatic conditions and higher productivity will allow Brazil to harvest its third-largest coffee crop in 2024.  The National Supply Company (Conab) forecasts a harvest of more than 58 million bags, 5.5 percent higher than last year’s and below only the 2020 (63 million) and 2018 (61.6 million) crops. The recovery comes after climatic adversities […]

The post Brazil to harvest its third-largest coffee crop this year appeared first on The Brazilian Report.

title: Dengue: Vaccines to the rescue
description:
Last year alone, more than 50,000 people in Brazil were hospitalized for dengue fever, and 1,094 deaths were reported.  The country had 1.6 million registered cases of dengue, a significant increase of 16 percent compared to 2022.  These numbers have raised concerns among experts and civil society, with debates about possible solutions to curb the […]

The post Dengue: Vaccines to the rescue appeared first on The Brazilian Report.
